Abstract:
The MODIS/Aqua version-5 (V5) level-2 LST/E data (Shortname: MYD11_L2) incorporate 1-km pixels, which are produced daily at 5-minute increments using the generalized split-window algorithm. This algorithm is optimally used to separate ranges of atmospheric column water vapor and lower boundary air surface temperatures into tractable sub-ranges. The surface emissivities in Bands 31 and 32 are estimated from land cover types.

The data inputs include the MODIS L1B calibrated and geolocated radiances, geolocation, cloud mask, atmospheric profiles, land and snow cover. The V5 MYD11_L2 data set comprises swath data obtained in 5-minute sensor collection periods, and includes the following Science Data Set (SDS) layers: LST, quality control assessment, error estimates, Bands 31 and 32 emissivities, zenith angle of the pixel view, observation time, and the geographic coordinates for every five scan lines and samples. Produced daily, MYD11_L2 is an unprojected level-2 product, which provides the input for the level-3 products.

The V5 Aqua/MODIS LST/E products, including MYD11_L2, are validated to Stage-2 through field campaigns and radiance-based validation studies. Further details regarding MODIS land product validation for the LST/E products is available from the following URL: http://landval.gsfc.nasa.gov/ProductStatus.php?ProductID=MYD11

This product is ready for use in science applications/publications.

The V5 collection is not consistent with V4 and V41, and users should exercise caution as they plan to use the different collections.  Please refer to the LP DAAC MODIS product table at https://lpdaac.usgs.gov/products/modis_products_table/myd11_l2  for additional detailed product version information.

V005 Data Set Characteristics: 
Area: ~2330 km x 2000 km lat/long 
Image Dimensions: 2030 x 1354 rows/columns 
File Size: ~6 MB compressed
Resolution: ~1000 meters 
Projection: None (swath data)
Data Format: HDF-EOS 
Science Data Sets (SDS HDF Layers): 9

RelatedUrls.Description: Data set landing page at the LP DAAC
Interface to search, discover, and access EOS data products, and invoke available data services.
LP DAAC Data Pool provides direct access to all currently available MODIS products and the ability to download them via HTTP.

USGS EarthExplorer (EE) provides users the ability to query, search and order archived ASTER and MODIS products available from the LP DAAC.  Registered users of EE have access to additional features than guest users.

Near real-time (NRT) data are available from MODAPS for certain Aqua and Terra MODIS L0, L1, L2, L2G, and L3 products. Whereas the standard MODIS forward processing acquires 2-hour L0 files for Aqua and Terra from EDOS within 7-8 hours of real time, LANCE-MODIS acquires session-based L0 files from EDOS and the end of the session is available within 10-30 minutes after real time.

The Land Processes Distributed Active Archive Center (LP DAAC) is one of several discipline-specific data centers within the NASA Earth Observing System Data and Information System (EOSDIS).  The LP DAAC Web page provides information about available data products, services, documentation, order interfaces, and tools.
The MODIS Land home page is maintained through NASA's Goddard Space Flight Center and documents various aspects of the land component of the MODIS mission.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: GRANULENUMBER
AdditionalAttributes.Description: The number of the granule for the day starting at midnight. Example: The granule from 00:00:00 to 00:00:05 will be granule number 1. The granule from 00:01:00 to 00:01:05 will be granule number 13

AdditionalAttributes.Name: QAFRACTIONGOODQUALITY
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Fraction of pixels with good quality of product

AdditionalAttributes.Name: QAFRACTIONNOTPRODUCEDCLOUD
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Fraction of pixels without product due to cloud

AdditionalAttributes.Name: QAFRACTIONNOTPRODUCEDOTHER
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Fraction of pixels without product due to reasons other than cloud

AdditionalAttributes.Name: QAFRACTIONOTHERQUALITY
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Fraction of pixels with not so good quality of product

AdditionalAttributes.Name: QAPERCENTGOODQUALITY
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Percent of pixels with good quality

AdditionalAttributes.Name: QAPERCENTNOTPRODUCEDOTHER
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Percent of pixels not produced due to some reason other than cloud

AdditionalAttributes.Name: QAPERCENTOTHERQUALITY
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Percent of pixels with not so good quality

AdditionalAttributes.Name: PROCESSVERSION
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Version of the process software that generated the product.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: CLOUD_CONTAMINATED_LST_SCREENED
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Indicator of whether cloud-contaminated Land Surface Temperature values are screened off.

EntryTitle: MODIS/Aqua Land Surface Temperature/Emissivity 5-Min L2 Swath 1km V005

Characteristics.Name: EquatorCrossingTime
Characteristics.Description: Local time of the equator crossing and direction (ascending or descending)

DataCenters.LongName: Land Processes Distributed Active Archive Center

ContactInformation.ServiceHours: M-F, 8 a.m. to 4 p.m. Central Time

StreetAddresses: U.S. Geological Survey, Earth Resources Observation and Science (EROS) Center
